title: Virtual Learning Object-Based Education for Understanding Autologous Stem Cell Transplantation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of immunology
context.additional_context: Requirement for Administrators to Make Patient Treatment Protocol Decisions and Perform Team Leadership Roles

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical background and clinical applications of autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
Learners can demonstrate step-by-step procedures for hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in treating autoimmune diseases.
Learners can analyze transplantation-related guidelines and legal requirements using virtual learning objects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
